title: How to Make a Gemini Woman Miss You

steps.title: Most Gemini women love to flirt, even over text.
steps.content: Most Gemini women love to flirt, even over text. If you two aren’t together, send her a flirty message or leave her a voicemail telling her that you can’t wait to see her. If you two meet up, keep the flirtation going—touch her arm, make her laugh, and give her a few compliments. [2] X Research source For a lot of Gemini women, flirtation is a version of foreplay. The more you can flirt with her when you’re together, the more she’ll miss you when you’re gone. Love astrology? Take this quiz to discover your soulmate’s sign.

steps.title: Gemini women love to use their minds.
steps.content: Gemini women love to use their minds. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. If you’re working on a project, snap a quick pic and send it her way. If you read a cool article, send her a link so you two can talk about it. She’ll love discussing deep things and having intellectual debates with you. [4] X Research source You can also appeal to her individual interests. If you read something cool about the history of the Olympics and you know she’s an avid sports fan, send it along and say that it made you think of her.

steps.title: Send her a quick text with a picture from a fun time.
steps.content: Send her a quick text with a picture from a fun time. Keep the caption lighthearted—something like “Thinking of you!” or “Came across this while organizing files” makes it seem cool and casual. Chances are, she’ll reminisce about the good times you shared and aim to repeat them. [5] X Research source When she responds, you can turn your conversation into a longer catch-up and then eventually invite her out for coffee or drinks.

steps.title: Gemini women love a good witty conversation.
steps.content: Gemini women love a good witty conversation. [6] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Send her a meme, text her a joke, and keep everything light and funny. She’ll love any joke you tell her, but she’ll appreciate the deeper, more intellectual ones even more. [7] X Research source By texting her a joke every once in a while, you can remind her of your sense of humor and get her thinking about you (even when you’re not around). Keep her constantly amused so that she doesn't lose interest too quickly. [8] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: Post about them so she can see what you’re doing.
steps.content: Post about them so she can see what you’re doing. Go for a hike, take a rock climbing class, or drive down to the beach for a day. Snap some pics and post them on social media so she can see the cool activities you get up to on your own. [9] X Research source If she inquires about any of your latest activities, tell her about them and then offer to take her on one. Gemini women love a good sense of adventure!

steps.title: Don’t let her in on every little detail.
steps.content: Don’t let her in on every little detail. If you go out of town for work, post some pictures of your hotel, but don’t say what you’re in town for. It will leave her guessing and she may just approach you to see what you’re all about. [10] X Research source You could also give some details about your life to mutual friends of yours. That way, the info will get back to her, but it won’t be you telling her about it.

steps.title: Most Gemini women appreciate someone who is driven.
steps.content: Most Gemini women appreciate someone who is driven. If you’re working toward goals in your life, don’t stop just to chase your romantic interest. Show her that you can achieve things in your life by working hard and doing your best in your field. [11] X Trustworthy Source American Psychological Association Leading scientific and professional organization of licensed psychologists Go to source If you’re in school, focus on getting good grades to build a solid foundation for your future career.

steps.title: Take an art class or doodle in your notebook at work.
steps.content: Take an art class or doodle in your notebook at work. Snap a few pics of your latest project and send them to her or post them online. If you can show that you’re both smart and creative, a Gemini woman is that much more likely to miss you when you’re not around. [12] X Research source Lots of things can be art! Photography, collage-making, bead work, and sewing are just a few examples of projects you could try out.

steps.title: Don’t get locked into a strict routine.
steps.content: Don’t get locked into a strict routine. If you get tickets to a last minute show, invite her along! If the weather looks perfect and you want to take the day off, drive out to the beach and send her some pictures. Gemini women appreciate someone who can be spontaneous because it shows you don’t take yourself too seriously. [13] X Research source If you aren’t a spontaneous person naturally, this might take some practice. Just remember that life doesn’t need to be super serious!

steps.title: Maintain your self-esteem and hold your head high.
steps.content: Maintain your self-esteem and hold your head high. When you’re talking to a Gemini woman, you can compliment her, but don’t make it sound like she’s too good for you. Remember that you’re a catch and she’ll probably start to see it, too. [14] X Research source A lot of people think that women will be flattered by statements like “You’re too good for me!” However, things like that can be intimidating, since it feels like you’re putting them on a pedestal. Instead, when you compliment her, try things like, “Your laugh is amazing,” “I love talking to you,” or “We always have the best conversations.”

steps.title: Chasing a Gemini woman is a surefire way to scare her off.
steps.content: Chasing a Gemini woman is a surefire way to scare her off. If you text her and don’t hear back for a while, try not to send another message. Don’t make yourself available to her 24/7; instead, live your life how you normally would, but leave a little room for her in it. [15] X Research source Pressuring a Gemini into commitments before she’s ready can scare her, which could make her run away from you.
